title: The Awakening
subtitle: By Ben Spier and Jack Carpenter
content: Step into the magical kingdom of Hyrule, where a farm boy named Kael holds a secret legacy. As ancestral spirits stir from their slumber, a menacing darkness looms. Journey with Kael, awaken the power within, and turn the tides to save the realm!
